trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> 中的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 表示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> 中的狀態。

trans-unit.source: State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 狀態活動可包含一個或多個 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>，或 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 類別、一個 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 類別和一個 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> 類別。

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: SetState 活動用於 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 之內，以移動工作流程的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 正在執行時，只會接收可由 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 中 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 活動處理的事件，以及可由附加至封入 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 活動和根 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 之 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 活動的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts running, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 開始執行時，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 將確認是否呈現 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 活動。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 擁有零或一個 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 活動。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果呈現 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 活動，則將執行 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>。

trans-unit.source: As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> blocks events so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: 只要 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 活動一完成，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 便會封鎖事件，因此 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 只接收可由其 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 活動處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 為 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，亦即 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 活動可以包含其他活動。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> class and use it implement a simple state machine to transition between 3 states.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 類別的新執行個體，並用它實作簡單狀態機器，以便在 3 個狀態之間轉換。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[簡單狀態機器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[簡單狀態機器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活動的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的執行內容。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 取消執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />。

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 執行中工作流程執行個體中 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的執行內容。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />。

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 執行中工作流程執行個體中 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: 子活動。

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應至指定子活動名稱之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
trans-unit.target: 動態子活動。

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the <paramref name="childActivityName" />.
trans-unit.target: 可執行活動不包含 <paramref name="childActivityName" />。

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得服務的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用服務提供者初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />。

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The activity added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> 的活動。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the activity being added is an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 判斷加入的活動是否為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />，如果是，則驗證是否必須訂閱新加入的事件驅動。

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: 每當使用者透過工作流程變更將子系加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，即呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 注意，這個方法是在 CompositeActivity 中定義的，且由 StateActivity 覆寫，在此它會檢查加入的活動是否為 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>，如果是，則驗證是否必須訂閱新加入的事件驅動。

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得服務的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫，做為活動轉換為 <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> 狀態的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: 保留變更追蹤資料索引鍵的字串值；"StateActivity.StateChange"。

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。
